QuestData.Title: The Cycle of the Sea
QuestData.Description:
Thank you, $n. I have learned what I need for now from our new friends.
The funeral ceremony for their former chieftain is about to start. Given how kind and hospitable the Iskaarans have been to us, it seems only right that we join them before departing back to the Archives.
Speak with Brena and let her know we are ready when they are.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Brena to witness the funeral ceremony.
